# Snow Removal and Ice Control - Fredericton

## Contract Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4211130010
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4211130010
* **Publication Date:** September 13, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 24, 2023
* **Amendment Date:** October 24, 2023

## Services Description

Canada is inviting bids from qualified Offerors to provide Snow and Ice Control (SNIC) services at the Fredericton Armoury, under the supervision and authorization of the Department of National Defence (DND).

## Bidder Eligibility and Requirements

* The Offeror must demonstrate its ability to provide SNIC services in accordance with the specifications provided.
* The Offeror must have a proven track record of providing similar services to government agencies.
* The Offeror must have a valid license and/operating permit where necessary.
* The Offeror must have the necessary equipment, tools, and personnel to perform the work efficiently and effectively.
* The Offeror must meet all the conditions and requirements outlined in the bid package.

## Tendering Process

* Bidders must submit their proposal electronically through the Ariba supplier portal.
* Bidders must ensure that their proposal is received by the closing date and time.
* Bidders are responsible for ensuring that their proposal complies with all the requirements and conditions outlined in the bid package.
* All inquiries must be addressed to Kate Mintzer (SPAC/PSPC) at kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca no later than five days prior to the bid closing date.

## Trade Agreements

* This tender is subject to the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA).

## Regions of Operation

* The services will be performed in the province of New Brunswick, specifically in the Fredericton area.

## Contracting Entity and End User
